description: Try our easy to follow Mediterranean BBQ Lamb Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mediterranean BBQ Lamb Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Top pizza with cooked halloumi and sprinkle with tabouleh. Add chilli sauce, yoghurt, and a squeeze of lemon juice. Cut into slices to serve.
